lead_paragraph: The bigger capital cushion, meant to provide more protection against risk, would apply to British banks with more than $250 billion in total assets.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Bank of England Proposes Retail Banking Protection
headline.main: Bank of England to Require More Buffers for Britain’s Biggest Banks

snippet: The bigger capital cushion, meant to provide more protection against risk, would apply to British banks with more than $250 billion in total assets.
abstract: Bank of England announces proposal that would require Britain's largest banks to quarantine their retail banking businesses from their investment businesses as protection against financial crises.
